app_metadata.description: Vikunja is an open-source, self-hostable to-do app.
app_metadata.name: vikunja

run_as_context.description: Vikunja runs as any non-root user.
Redis runs as a non-root user and root group.

app_metadata.title: Vikunja

attrs.label: URL
attrs.description:
The URL that Vikunja will be accessible from.</br>
Example: </br>
http://server.ip:30080</br>
https://Vikunja.example.com

attrs.label: Max File Size (in MB)
attrs.description: The maximum file size for attachments in MB.

attrs.description: The JWT secret for Vikunja.

attrs.description: The password for Vikunja.

attrs.description: The password for Vikunja.

attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Vikunja.

attrs.description: The user id that Vikunja files will be owned by.

attrs.description: The group id that Vikunja files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.</br>
SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB/CIFS Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

1.2.2.readme:
Vikunja

Vikunja is an open-source, self-hostable to-do app.
